title: Ash Training Day 5 Part 2
description: Understanding the Power of Three (PO3) model: Accumulation, Manipulation, and Distribution phases.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• The three phases of PO3 model
• Accumulation phase and its characteristics
• Manipulation phase and stop hunting
• Distribution phase and takeoff
• How to identify each phase
• Using PO3 for timing precision

quiz.question: PO3 consists of:
quiz.explanation: PO3 (Power of Three) has three distinct phases: Accumulation, Manipulation, and Distribution.

quiz.question: Manipulation phase usually:
quiz.explanation: Manipulation phase tricks retail traders by creating false moves before the main expansion.

quiz.question: Distribution phase follows:
quiz.explanation: Distribution comes after both accumulation and manipulation, representing the selling phase.

quiz.question: Accumulation forms:
quiz.explanation: Accumulation phase typically forms before the expansion move begins.

quiz.question: PO3 model improves:
quiz.explanation: PO3 helps traders time their entries and exits more precisely by recognizing market phases.
